ygData.subject: Re: Optimus Fury
ygData.msgSnippet: The will of the Matrix would be similar in all dimensions. The details might vary, but Optimus Primal would still discover Vector Sigma. If everyone will

The "will of the Matrix" would be similar in all
dimensions. The details might vary, but Optimus Primal
would still discover Vector Sigma. If everyone will
agree to that much I'll shut up.

--- Vincent Price <thecode@...> wrote:
> OOC: I never denied it, he was, in Beast Machines,
> but not in this RPG, that's where you got it
> wrong...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Kyle Stewart 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Tuesday, November 27, 2001 11:37 AM
>   Subject: Re: Optimus Fury
> 
> 
>   I don't want to destroy it I simply want you to
> admit
>   Optimus Primal WAS reformatted.
> 
>   --- Vincent Price <thecode@...> wrote:
>   > OOC: I could if I wanted to, because I have my
> own
>   > specific names for them, and this is a Beast
> Wars
>   > RPG, and not a Beast Machines one, but I won't.
>   > Because I don't wish to destroy the RPG, like
> you
>   > do...
